select signDtl.id id, signDtl.parent_id parentId, signDtl.order_id orderId, signDtl.order_detail_id orderDetailId, signDtl.in_detail_id inDetailId,
signDtl.assist_product_id assistProductId, signDtl.order_unit orderUnit, round(ifnull(signDtl.arrive_count, 0), 2) arriveCount, signDtl.quality quality, signDtl.quality_type qualityType,
round(ifnull(signDtl.quality_count, 0), 2) qualityCount, round(ifnull(signDtl.bad_count, 0), 2) badCount, round(ifnull(signDtl.retreat_count, 0), 2) retreatCount, round(ifnull(signDtl.receive_count, 0), 2) receiveCount, signDtl.quality_indtl_id qualityIndtlId,
signDtl.receive_indtl_id receiveIndtlId, signDtl.state state, round(ifnull(signDtl.sign_fine_count, 0), 2) signFineCount, round(ifnull(signDtl.quality_fine_count, 0), 2) qualityFineCount, signDtl.cuser cuser,
signDtl.cdate cdate, signDtl.uuser uuser, signDtl.udate udate, signDtl.remark remark, signDtl.isdisable isdisable,
CASE WHEN signDtl.quality = '1' THEN '免检' WHEN signDtl.quality = '2' THEN '检验' ELSE null END qualityName,
CASE WHEN signDtl.quality_type = '1' THEN '全检' WHEN signDtl.quality_type = '2' THEN '抽检' ELSE null END qualityTypeName, signDtl.quality_type qualityTypeValue,
CASE WHEN signDtl.state = '1' THEN '检验中' WHEN signDtl.state = '2' THEN '已完成' WHEN signDtl.state = '-1' THEN '已取消' ELSE null END stateName,
sign.sys_code signCode,
assistOrder.supplier_id supplierId, supplier.name supplierName,
inDetail.parent_id inParentId,
assistProd.product_name assistProductName, assistProd.product_id productId, orderUnitName.name orderUnitName, craft.sys_code craftCode, craft.name craftName
from vmes_assist_sign_detail signDtl left join vmes_assist_sign sign on signDtl.parent_id = sign.id left join vmes_assist_product assistProd on signDtl.assist_product_id = assistProd.id left join vmes_assist_craft craft on assistProd.craft_id = craft.id left join vmes_product_unit orderUnit on (assistProd.product_id = orderUnit.product_id and signDtl.order_unit = orderUnit.unit) left join vmes_dictionary orderUnitName on signDtl.order_unit = orderUnitName.id
left join vmes_assist_order assistOrder on signDtl.order_id = assistOrder.id left join vmes_customer supplier on assistOrder.supplier_id = supplier.id
left join vmes_warehouse_in_detail inDetail on signDtl.in_detail_id = inDetail.id left join vmes_warehouse_in inParent on inDetail.parent_id = inParent.id
and signDtl.parent_id = #{parentId}
and signDtl.quality = #{quality}
and ${queryStr}
order by ${orderStr}
